events.title: La Fiesta Carnival 2.0
events.description: A vibrant community event featuring fun games, live performances, and interactive activities for all ages. With themed decorations and exciting prizes, it promises a festive celebration of unity, joy, and diversity.

events.title: IPL Auction
events.description: A simulated IPL-style sports auction where teams of 4 bid on players with skill points (1-10) within a fixed budget to build a balanced squad. The winning team is determined through a points-based evaluation, blending strategy, teamwork, and fun.

events.title: Chitram
events.description: Sahiti, the Telugu literary association, presents Chitram, a grand competitive event featuring performances by Sahiti Club members, followed by final competitive rounds showcasing top talents in dance, singing, and dialogue delivery from the prelims, judged by a distinguished guest and followed by a lively concert.

events.title: Hogwarts' House Cup Chronicles
events.description: Join us for a ride through Hogwarts as we take on challenges like potion making, wand crafting and Quidditch.

events.title: Cashino 2.0
events.description: Captivating mystery arena packed with karaoke, family feud, jigsaw puzzles, financial jeopardy, mocktail testing, speed networking, and more fun-filled games for an unforgettable evening.

events.title: SMRITI '25 – Thoolika
events.description: An artistic fusion of Malayalam calligraphy, pencil drawing, and creative writing, celebrating the beauty of words, art, and imagination.

events.title: Bouncy Castle
events.description: Bouncy castles for everyone! Exciting inflatables for all ages. No need to pre-register, on-spot sign-ups available.

events.title: Orator's Arena
events.description: We start off with an orientation session full of rules and pro tips for success, after which we dive into prepared speeches and quick-fire impromptu rounds!

events.title: Dance It Out
events.description: An immersive dance workshop designed to give everyone a chance to learn diverse dance styles from all seven teams of VIT dance club!

events.title: Student of the Year 3.0
events.description: Get ready for the ultimate competition that pushes you to showcase your all-around excellence through thrilling challenges, unforgettable fun, and exciting prizes!
